source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_00<tab>Your nemesis-to-be appears unenthused to see his rival.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_00<tab>ウルダハのマーティンは、どこか不安な様子だ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_01<tab>Martyn is a bundle of nerves, but Royse is her customarily calm and cordial self, assuring you both that preparations at the Celestium are all but complete. She goes on to mention a special financial backer who helped to make the endeavor possible, insisting that you meet with them. To that end, she ushers the both of you to the Hustings Strip, hopeful they are yet lingering about.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_01<tab>マーティンと話したところ、ロイスがやってきて新たな敵役の準備が整ったという。今回は特別な協力者がいるというので、皆で挨拶に向かうことになった。ウルダハの政庁層で「ロイス」と話そう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_02<tab>Royse's secret benefactor was none other than Godbert Manderville. Apparently, he has been offering financial support to the Celestium for quite some time. Upon hearing of her plans to incorporate a new performance into the Celestium's itinerary, he volunteered his full support to make Royse's dream a reality. He soon takes his leave, leaving the three of you to settle the matter of newly fashioned costumes and equipment for the show.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_02<tab>特別な協力者とはゴッドベルトだった。彼の技術とノウハウのおかげで、新たな敵役の衣装と舞台装置が作れたそうだ。ブルースカイで、その試着と試運転が行われ、マーティンは、黄金闘士ゴールドルとなった。どうやら、彼の守銭奴なところから、発想された敵役のようだ。ミルバネス礼拝堂付近の「マーティン」と話そう。

source:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_03<tab>Fitted with his golden armor and minions at his beck and call, Martyn is certain to push you to your limits as a blue mage. He has no intention of holding back, and so he asks that you answer his fervor in kind.

※The next blue mage quest will be available from Martyn after completing stage 32 of the Masked Carnivale.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_03<tab>思わぬ形での師弟対決となったが、マスクカーニバルで黄金闘士ゴールドルの撃破に挑戦しよう！

※マスクカーニバルのステージ32をクリアすると、ミルバネス礼拝堂付近のマーティンから次の青魔道士クエストを受注することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_04<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_05<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_06<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_07<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_10<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_11<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SEQ_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Royse.
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Martyn.
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_02<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_03<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_04<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_100_000<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SYSTEM_100_001<tab>
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You're lookin' well... By that look in your eye, I take it you're here for more than a little friendly banter.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>君、さらに腕を磨いてきたか。
その実力を、わが身を以て試すことになるのだな……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_001<tab>Well, you'll be glad to know I'm duly rested from our venture to Ishgard. Still, I'd be lyin' if I said I wasn't feelin' a little anxious.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_001<tab>こちらは旅の疲れこそ癒えたものの、
自分が新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>になるということが、
どうにも不安で仕方がないよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_002<tab>You have nothing to be concerned about, Martyn. Preparations at the Celestium are all but complete.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_002<tab>まあ、そう心配しないで、
こちらで進めていた準備は滞りなく完了したわ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_003<tab>As we speak, artisans are putting the finishing touches on your new costume and accoutrements. And fret not, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─you shall have new attire as well.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_003<tab>新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>を演出する、衣装と舞台装置が完成したのよ。
もちろん、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>の新衣装もね。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_004<tab>'Twas a most difficult endeavor, to be sure, but thanks to a most generous benefactor, everything continues to proceed apace.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_004<tab>ところで、それらの製作にあたって、
今回、特別に協力してもらった人がいるの。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_005<tab>Speaking of whom, I should very much like for you to meet them. If we leave now, we should be able to find them at the Hustings Strip.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_005<tab>協力者に皆で揃って挨拶したいから、
政庁層まで来てくれるかしら？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_006<tab>The Hustings Strip!? Who could she be workin' with that frequents a place like that?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_006<tab>せ、政庁層だって？
いったい、誰に協力してもらったというのだ……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_010<tab>How much financial support do you think she needed? ...And what did she promise to receive it?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_010<tab>ここは、どうも落ち着かないな……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_011<tab>Who do you think this mysterious benefactor could be? Oh, I can hardly wait to meet them!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_011<tab>協力者って誰でしょう？
何だかわくわくしますね……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_020<tab>If you would wait here a moment.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_020<tab>それじゃあ、特別な協力者をお呼びしてくるわね。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_021<tab>Here they are─the soon-to-be stars of our latest coming attraction at the Celestium!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_021<tab>マスクカーニバルの新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>に新風を吹き込むため、
今回は特別にこの方に協力してもらったのよ！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_022<tab>Hoho, so these are the famed fighters of the Masked Carnivale! A pleasure to make your acquaintance.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_022<tab>ホッホッホゥ！
マスクカーニバルの皆さんにお会いできて光栄です！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_023<tab>Godbert Manderville? President of Manderville & Manderville, owner of the Gold Saucer, and member of the Syndicate? <var 1A 02 /var>That<var 1A 01 /var> Godbert Manderville?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_023<tab>ゴ、ゴッドベルトさん！
砂蠍衆のひとりにして、あのゴールドソーサーの支配人であり、
マンダヴィル＆マンダヴィル社の社長……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_100_023<tab>If he's involved, maybe this is our chance to strike it rich!
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_024<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I didn't realize you too are a member of the Celestium's entourage. No rest for the righteous, I see.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_024<tab>おや、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>殿も、
マスクカーニバルの関係者でしたか？
いやはや、あなたも忙しいお方ですな。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_100_024<tab>We've met before, have we not? I didn't realize you too are a member of the Celestium's entourage.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_100_024<tab>おや、あなたも、
マスクカーニバルの関係者でしたか……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_025<tab>As for my involvement with the Masked Carnivale, I have long supported Royse's enterprise at the Celestium. In fact, I believe it was around the time Typhon made their debut that I first offered her my services.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_025<tab>マスクカーニバルにテュポーン殿を出場させたりと、
ブルースカイとは、以前から協力関係にありましたが……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_026<tab>When she told me of her plans to seek out a worthy rival for the Carnivale's star performer, I knew at once no effort could be spared. And so, the sum total of my company's knowledge and know-how was leveraged to see her plans to fruition.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_026<tab>今回は、新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>を演出するために、
弊社が持つ技術とノウハウを、惜しみなく提供いたしました。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_027<tab>It is no exaggeration to say none of what is to come would be possible if not for you.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_027<tab>衣装、舞台装置ともに、ゴッドベルトさんの協力がなければ、
実現できなかったことばかりです。
この度は、本当にありがとうございました！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_028<tab>Please, think nothing of it. The Celestium and its Masked Carnivale serve as both a source of entertainment and inspiration for the good people of Ul'dah, and it would be remiss of me to deprive this fair city-state of so precious a jewel.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_028<tab>いえいえ、こちらこそマスクカーニバルからは、
大いにインスピレーションを受けております。
これからも、ウルダハの娯楽産業を共に盛り上げていきましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_029<tab>Now, if you will excuse me─another engagement demands my attention.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_GODBERT_000_029<tab>それでは別件の仕事がありますので、
私は、これにて失礼させていただきますぞ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_030<tab>Now that introductions are out of the way, we may see to costume fitting and a test of your new equipment.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_030<tab>さて、挨拶も済んだことだし、
さっそく衣装合わせと、舞台装置の試運転をしたいわ。
ブルースカイへ向かいましょう！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_200<tab>My, don't you cut a striking figure!
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_200<tab>うん、新衣装、よく似合ってるわね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_201<tab>Wasn't I supposed to have a new costume as well?
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_202<tab>Ah, but of course! Only the very best for <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>'s dreaded nemesis...
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_202<tab>マスクカーニバルの新たな<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>、
その名も……

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_100_202<tab>The diabolical Goldor!
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_203<tab>Is it just my imagination or...has he grown taller?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_203<tab>先生……なんか大きくなってないですか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_204<tab>That would be the glamour prisms. All the better to make him appear more imposing.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_204<tab><var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>は迫力がないといけないからね。
ミラージュプリズムを応用して、大きく見せているの。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_205<tab>And the crystal there will further augment his magicks to ensure he is a match for our star.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_205<tab>そして、この金のクリスタルは、
魔力の増幅器としての機能を持ち合わせていて、
マーティンの魔法を強化してくれるのよ。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_206<tab>Naturally, there will also be automata and familiars at his disposal, so you had best be on your guard, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_206<tab>さらには、魔法人形や魔物も投入する予定だから、
<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>も、油断はしないことね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_207<tab>That sounds a mite unfair, don't you think?
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_207<tab>そ、それって、反則じゃないですか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_208<tab>Well, we could hardly call it a show if you failed to put <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> on the back foot.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_208<tab>あら、<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>が卑怯な手を使って憎まれてこそ、
試合は盛り上がるものでしょう？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_209<tab>We'll also need to work on your persona, though it should be easy enough if we focus on your naturally miserly character. I've prepared a script for you, so please try to remember your lines.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_209<tab>それと、ゴールドルの性格付けなんだけど、
マーティンの守銭奴なところから発想して考えてみたの。
あとで台本を渡すから、台詞も覚えてしっかり演じてね！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_210<tab>Miserly...?
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_211<tab>Perhaps we should start with a nice menacing threat.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_211<tab>ひとまず、決め台詞だけでも練習してみましょう。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_212<tab>You think you know pain? Hah! I will make you long for something as sweet as pain!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_212<tab>わしのクリスタルは渡さん！
しねい！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_213<tab>Marvelous! Simply marvelous! The crowds will adore you.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_ROYSE_000_213<tab>バッチリじゃない！
これはきっと盛り上がるわよ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_215<tab>I must confess, this Goldor character suits Martyn quite well.
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_215<tab>ゴールドルになった先生、とっても輝いてましたね……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_220<tab>Goldor, the diabolical. Goldor, the miserly. ...People don't really think of me as miserly, do they?
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_220<tab>やれやれ、守銭奴のゴールドルとはね。
私はそんな風に見られていたのか……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_221<tab>Don't worry about that, Martyn. People will love to hate you, I'm sure of it.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_PYANDIH_000_221<tab>先生、とってもハマってましたよ！
<var 4A ((敵役)) ((ヒール)) /var>、向いてるんじゃないですか？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_222<tab>I'm not entirely sure if that's a good thing...
target: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_222<tab>そ、それはいいことなのだろうか……？

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_223<tab>But if this is the role I'm to play, you can be damn sure I'll give it my all.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_223<tab>まあ、こうなったからには、
腹をくくって、思い切って演じるしかないだろうな。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_224<tab>And I suppose it was only a matter of time before you and I would go toe-to-toe, even if this isn't quite how I imagined it.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_224<tab>それに、君とはいつか師弟対決してみたかったんだ。
こんな形で実現するとは思わなかったがね……。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_225<tab>I won't be holdin' back, and don't expect you to, neither.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_225<tab>よい機会だから、
お互い、手加減なしで精一杯、戦おうじゃないか！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_226<tab>The incomparable Goldor─formerly known as Azuro the Third─will ever be at the ready. Just say the word!
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_MARTYN_000_226<tab>三代目マスク・ザ・ブルー改め、ゴールドル！
わしはいつでも、お前の挑戦を待っているぞ……！

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SYSTEM_000_227<tab>A new stage has been added to the Masked Carnivale, and can be accessed by speaking with the Celestium attendant.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SYSTEM_000_227<tab>青魔道士コンテンツ「マスクカーニバル」に、
新たなステージが追加されました。
「ブルースカイの案内人」から挑戦することができます。

source: TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SYSTEM_000_228<tab>New duties have also been added to the blue mage log. Access the “Blue Mage Log” tab via the blue magic spellbook, found in the main menu.
target:
TEXT_JOBAOZ800_04777_SYSTEM_000_228<tab>「青魔道士ログ」に挑戦可能なコンテンツが追加されています。
メインコマンドの「青魔道書」タブから、
「青魔道士ログ」のメニューを開いて挑戦することができます。
